pullRequest.title: Added TSGs to exception messages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added TSGs to exception messages
Closes #15959
Related PR : https://msdata.visualstudio.com/CosmosDB/_git/CosmosDB/pullrequest/384158

nodes.bodyText: This should already be included in the backend error message. In what scenario would the SDK be generating this message?
Please create a new link and page java request timeouts. This link should only be returned by the service request timeouts.

commit.message: Updated TSG links to microsoft docs for java sdk v4
